messages.passwordError: Your new password does not meet the minimum requirements: it must include atleast one character, one number and one special character.
messages.passwordMinMax: Your new password must be between 8 and 40 characters.
messages.emailValid: Your email address must be in a valid format.

signUp.success: Your account has been created. The next step is to validate your email address. Please log into your email account and click the link to confirm your email address.
signUp.emailDuplicate: That email address is already registered with StockFacts. Please enter a new email address.

verifyAccount.success: Your email address has been verified. Select the link below to access StockFacts Premium.
verifyAccount.invaldToken: The time limit for validating your email address has expired. Select the link below to access StockFacts Premium, then login to trigger another validation email to be sent to you.

signIn.invalidUserPass: The email address and/or password you entered are not valid.
signIn.accountLocked: You have surpassed the number of allowable logins (we allow three attempts). Your account has been locked. Please try again in 30 minutes.

forgotPass.emailReset: An email was sent to reset your password.

resetPass.invaldToken: The time limit for resetting your password has expired.
